Compatible with iOS 8, 9 and 10

RecordPause allows you to pause and resume video recording in stock camera app. After you start recording, tap & hold the shutter button to pause. Repeat the same step if you want to resume. During video is paused, the UI turns yellow.

Configure from settings.

Version: 1.2.2
- Add tapping elapsed time to resume/pause recording (based on requests)


Version: 1.2.1
- The tweak no longer prevents burst mode to work


Version: 1.2
- iOS 10 support
- Revised: resume/pause video are now done via tap & hold the shutter button
